parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Alibaba Cloud Resource Name (ARN) of the event rule.

parameters.name: EventBusName
parameters.description: The name of the event bus.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries returned per page.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: If you configure Limit and excess return values exist, this parameter is returned.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: The name of the event rule.
